file_content.text: Can this wait? We're a little busy here!
What's the galaxy coming to? Hutts invading, planets cracking in half, and now that... that... whatever it was! Somebody tell me what that was!
I'll get these people out of here. Sounds like you need to be heading for Shalim's new camp site. Thanks for saving us.
We're under attack in the central square! Help us! Hurr--
Whatever you're doing out there, it's working like a charm. The Hutts aren't landing reinforcements. Keep it up!
We've got our wounded stabilized. We're prepping everyone for evacuation at the central square. Keep those Hutt forces off us!
It appeared to be a droid, Mayor.
Here I was thinking it was a shiny Wookiee on stilts wearing turbolasers for a hat! "A droid," indeed! Now... who the blazes are you?
I'm a Jedi Knight, here to protect you on behalf of Shalim Avesta and the Galactic Republic.
I'm someone who can help.
Thought as much, what with the lightsaber and all. Good.
I represent the Jedi. I was sent by Shalim Avesta to defend you from this attack.
I'm a friend.
In that case, welcome to Tarlam.
Republic Special Forces Infantry Unit 326. My team's evacuating everyone off Makeb.
I'm Havoc Squad.
Not everyone, hopefully. Hutts can stay.
I'm one of the Republic's top experts on Hutt-smashing, or whatever. My point is, I'm the best.
Hello, I'm your expert help.
What a relief. Thanks for gracing us with your presence.
Take a deep breath and relax. You don't need to yell.
Calm down, please.
I'm sorry, what? I can't hear over that ringing in my ears! You know, from all the screaming and explosions!
I'm the person in charge here--effective immediately.
Your replacement.
You want the shortest term as mayor in town history? Take it!
These are the reinforcements Shalim Avesta told us to expect. They're here to help.
This mesa's already collapsing. Now I've got wounded people everywhere, and all the working shuttle pads are outside town.
You obviously can't stay. What will it take to get your people out of here safely?
Tell me how to assist.
It's not a question of resources--we're racing disaster here. No telling when this mesa will fall apart.
Shalim can get more shuttles for the evacuation.
We can call for support.
What we really need is the one thing those Hutts won't give us--time.
Unless you can evacuate people with your mouth, I suggest closing it and getting to work.
Stop whining and act!
Thanks for the advice!
Mayor, we're getting emergency alerts. The Hutts are landing reinforcements--mercenaries and more of those droids!
Lovely! I'm the one-legged woman at the droid-kicking contest!
They're holding the shuttle pads. We'll never get off the mesa unless someone drives the enemy off.
Leave the Hutt forces to me. I'll open the routes out of here--you be ready to move your people.
I'll clear you a path.
It's a big mesa. Surely there's another way off it?
Can't you go around?
Those droids are fast, and their weapons have enough kick to take us out from a distance. If you can't handle them, we're dead.
I'll take on those Hutt forces, but you'll never get everyone moving. Decide now who gets left behind.
Abandon the wounded and run.
I promised my people I'd get them to safety--all of them.
Just clearing off the pads isn't enough, though. We need to stop the Hutts from landing more reinforcements until we've all evacuated.
We could erect energy shields, Mayor. Cover the pads so they can only be used for flying out.
Soler, you're actually useful! If we got you some energy shields, could you set them up at each landing pad?
You can count on me--complicated missions are my specialty. I'll clear the shuttle pads and make sure they won't work for the Hutts.
Of course.
Can't you just run for it once the shuttle pads are clear?
This is getting complicated.
Our wounded move too slowly. You've got to buy us more time.
Stop wasting time with stupid questions and give me what I need to secure those pads!
Just hand over the stuff!
I appreciate your enthusiasm!
Gather the wounded! Prep for evacuation on the double! We are leaving!
Take these energy shields; activate them at the landing pads. Good luck!
